description: I'm one of those bakers, who don't even feel comfortable melting chocolate in a microwave, nevermind making a cake. So imagine my surprise when I found myself cooking a cake via microwave, doing all the mixing in the jar I was cooking it in, and with all utensils available -- a fork! (Well, I used some chopsticks to mix in my berries, but stil!)
title: Microwave Black Pepper Raspberry Mug Cakes
